SEARCH
Package src.model

Class HDBManager

java.lang.Object
src.model.User
src.model.HDBManager
public class HDBManager extends User
Represents an HDB Manager who oversees projects, handles officer and applicant approvals, and manages reports and visibility settings.

  • Constructor Details

    • HDBManager

      public HDBManager(String nric, String password, String name, int age, String maritalStatus)
      Constructs a new HDBManager with the specified user details. Initializes the list of projects managed by this manager.
      Parameters:
      nric - The manager's NRIC used for login.
      password - The login password for the manager.
      name - Full name of the manager.
      age - Age of the manager.
      maritalStatus - Marital status of the manager.
